oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sheet music covers; Centennial celebrations
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color drawing of the front of and side view of the Parthenon building at the 1897 Tennessee Centenial Exposition. The drawing is embellished by figures of urns, torches, flowers, ribbons, and musical instruments. Notation indicates "Official Music Souvenir." "Brandon Printing Co., Nashville."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: H. A. French Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Kenneth D. Rose Sheet Music Collection
